jobs.title: Founding Fullstack Engineer - Core
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Join our core engineering team to build and scale cloud-native services and full-stack solutions. You’ll work across frontend and backend systems, drive technical initiatives, and play a key role in delivering high-quality, production-ready features. This role gives you ownership and autonomy — you’ll move fast, learn fast, and push the boundaries of what’s possible.

What You’ll Be Working On

🚀 Core Development

  • Write scalable business logic for our cloud-native backend services.

  • Drive and implement frontend solutions with modern frameworks.

  • Collaborate closely with product, design, and engineering teams to build end-to-end functionality.

  • Quickly adopt and adapt to new technologies — stepping out of your comfort zone is part of the daily routine.

🛠 Engineering Citizenship

  • Maintain, refactor, and migrate existing services.

  • Participate in code reviews to ensure high standards.

  • Handle on-call rotations and incident management.

  • Improve developer processes and experience across the full lifecycle from coding to operations.

💡 Technical Leadership

  • Write technical designs and lead discussions on emerging products.

  • Drive initiatives that align with business OKRs, conducting research and designing solutions for long-term impact.

  • Contribute to every stage of product development — from ideation to prototyping, A/B testing, and scaling architectures.

✅ Technical Quality

  • Employ automated testing to ensure reliability and resilience of features.

  • Implement rigorous release practices including code reviews, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment automation.

🎯 Autonomy & Ownership

  • Drive projects independently without constant guidance from Tech Leads/CTO.

  • Communicate technical decisions effectively in meetings, Slack discussions, design docs, and daily updates.

What We’re Looking for

  • Strong Vibe Coder

    • Able to produce high-quality, production-ready code at speed.

    • Demonstrates taste and craftsmanship — The Way of Code.

  • 1+ years of full-stack development experience, building consumer or business-facing products.

  • Proficiency in TypeScript, with experience in Python and Go (optional, but a plus).

  • Hands-on experience with Supabase, Postgres, Firebase.

  • Experience developing microservices in Node.js, Python, and Go.

  • Strong frontend expertise with React, Next.js, Electron (optional).

  • Infrastructure at scale: multi-tenant systems, load balancing, sticky sessions, caching, MQ.

  • Monitoring and observability with OpenTelemetry, Grafana, Datadog.

  • Analytics & experimentation platforms: PostHog, Amplitude, Optimizely.

  • Containerized services: Docker, ECS, Kubernetes.

  • Proven ability to deliver production-level code with robust error handling, unit tests, and E2E coverage.

Preferred Qualifications

  • Hackathon winner or equivalent hands-on builder track record.

  • Deep experience with Kubernetes and AWS.

  • Strong DevOps background, including building CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and software release.

  • Experience with WebSocket & Server-Sent Events (SSE).

  • Crawler and automation expertise: large-scale scraping, Selenium, Appium.

  • Data wrangling with BigQuery, plus data pipelines using Spark, Apache Beam, DBT, Airflow.

  • Experience building data lake and data warehouse solutions

What We can Bring to You

  • AI-native Development: Free-flow of coolest AI tools (Claude, Cursor, Devin, Zapier Agents.. you name it!). We may ask you to spend >= X tokens

  • True Ownership: We empower our engineers to think like company founders, proactively identify and own problems. You'll have significant autonomy from concept, design, tool to deployment.

  • Be Real, Be a Dreamer: We value creative and intelligent methods to achieve bigger dreams. Here you can push the boundary, collaborate with smart people, and build futuristic products together

  • High Aesthetic for Tech & Product: We champaign deep passions and high standard for technology and product. You can hold up your own taste on code quality, product design, system robustness, and the beauty of the final user experience

  • Hybrid Work: Provide flexibility for work, animal-and-plants friendly offices across China, India, and US. Sometime we organize offsite hackathon and fun parties!

  • Unlimited Pay Day-offs: Good life brings creativity. We value efficiency and impact, over unproductive overtime

Interview Process

  1. 15-min Intro Call - Learn more about our mission and hiring expectations

  2. Online Assignment Use any tools you like within OA system

  3. Two Rounds of Video Chats – One with 1-hour live coding exercise and another with 30-min deep dive. Just real problem solving on technical and soft skills, including some deep dives in your past projects.

  4. Paid Work Trial (4-5 Days) – If the fit feels right, you’ll dive right in and build with us. Get paid to show your skills in action.

About Final Round AI

Based in San Francisco, California, Final Round AI is revolutionizing the job interview process with cutting-edge technology. Our AI-native platform is powered by cutting-edge design and technology and developed via agentic workflow and newest development paradigm. Our mission is to help all-level candidates from students to senior managers to stand out, feel confident, and secure the job you’ve always wanted.

Backed by some of Silicon Valley's leading venture capital firms, Final Round AI continues to grow rapidly. Our team is expanding, and we’re looking for hacker-minded and visionary problem-solver and leaders to join a fast-paced, dynamic environment. With over one million candidates from 100+ countries already securing their dream jobs, Final Round AI is transforming careers and breaking new ground.

Join our core engineering team to build and scale cloud-native services and full-stack solutions. You’ll work across frontend and backend systems, drive technical initiatives, and play a key role in delivering high-quality, production-ready features. This role gives you ownership and autonomy — you’ll move fast, learn fast, and push the boundaries of what’s possible.

 - Drive projects independently without constant guidance from Tech Leads/CTO.

 - Communicate technical decisions effectively in meetings, Slack discussions, design docs, and daily updates.


WHAT WE’RE LOOKING FOR

 - Strong Vibe Coder
   
   - Able to produce high-quality, production-ready code at speed.
   
   - Demonstrates taste and craftsmanship — The Way of Code https://www.thewayofcode.com/.

 - 1+ years of full-stack development experience, building consumer or business-facing products.

 - Proficiency in TypeScript, with experience in Python and Go (optional, but a plus).

 - Hands-on experience with Supabase, Postgres, Firebase.

 - Experience developing microservices in Node.js, Python, and Go.

 - Strong frontend expertise with React, Next.js, Electron (optional).

 - Infrastructure at scale: multi-tenant systems, load balancing, sticky sessions, caching, MQ.

 - Monitoring and observability with OpenTelemetry, Grafana, Datadog.

 - Analytics & experimentation platforms: PostHog, Amplitude, Optimizely.

 - Containerized services: Docker, ECS, Kubernetes.

 - Proven ability to deliver production-level code with robust error handling, unit tests, and E2E coverage.


PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

 - Hackathon winner or equivalent hands-on builder track record.

 - Deep experience with Kubernetes and AWS.

 - Strong DevOps background, including building CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and software release.

 - Experience with WebSocket & Server-Sent Events (SSE).

 - Crawler and automation expertise: large-scale scraping, Selenium, Appium.

 - Data wrangling with BigQuery, plus data pipelines using Spark, Apache Beam, DBT, Airflow.

 - Experience building data lake and data warehouse solutions


WHAT WE CAN BRING TO YOU

 - AI-native Development: Free-flow of coolest AI tools (Claude, Cursor, Devin, Zapier Agents.. you name it!). We may ask you to spend >= X tokens

 - True Ownership: We empower our engineers to think like company founders, proactively identify and own problems. You'll have significant autonomy from concept, design, tool to deployment.

 - Be Real, Be a Dreamer: We value creative and intelligent methods to achieve bigger dreams. Here you can push the boundary, collaborate with smart people, and build futuristic products together

 - High Aesthetic for Tech & Product: We champaign deep passions and high standard for technology and product. You can hold up your own taste on code quality, product design, system robustness, and the beauty of the final user experience

 - Hybrid Work: Provide flexibility for work, animal-and-plants friendly offices across China, India, and US. Sometime we organize offsite hackathon and fun parties!

 - Unlimited Pay Day-offs: Good life brings creativity. We value efficiency and impact, over unproductive overtime


INTERVIEW PROCESS

 1. 15-min Intro Call - Learn more about our mission and hiring expectations

 2. Online Assignment Use any tools you like within OA system

 3. Two Rounds of Video Chats – One with 1-hour live coding exercise and another with 30-min deep dive. Just real problem solving on technical and soft skills, including some deep dives in your past projects.

 4. Paid Work Trial (4-5 Days) – If the fit feels right, you’ll dive right in and build with us. Get paid to show your skills in action.


ABOUT FINAL ROUND AI

Based in San Francisco, California, Final Round AI is revolutionizing the job interview process with cutting-edge technology. Our AI-native platform is powered by cutting-edge design and technology and developed via agentic workflow and newest development paradigm. Our mission is to help all-level candidates from students to senior managers to stand out, feel confident, and secure the job you’ve always wanted.

Backed by some of Silicon Valley's leading venture capital firms, Final Round AI continues to grow rapidly. Our team is expanding, and we’re looking for hacker-minded and visionary problem-solver and leaders to join a fast-paced, dynamic environment. With over one million candidates from 100+ countries already securing their dream jobs, Final Round AI is transforming careers and breaking new ground.

jobs.title: Data / BI Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Are you a data whisperer with a hacker's soul? Do you love to dive deep into complex AI-native applications and systems, extract meaningful insights, scale up data assets storage, and build elegant solutions that influence product decisions and user experience worldwide? If you thrive on challenging the status quo and turning raw data into strategic advantage, we want you.

What are we?

Based in San Francisco, California, Final Round AI is revolutionizing the job interview process with cutting-edge technology. Our AI-native platform is powered by cutting-edge design and technology and developed via agentic workflow and newest development paradigm. Our mission is to help all-level candidates from students to senior managers to stand out, feel confident, and secure the job you’ve always wanted.

Backed by some of Silicon Valley's leading venture capital firms, Final Round AI continues to grow rapidly. Our team is expanding, and we’re looking for hacker-minded and visionary problem-solver and leaders to join a fast-paced, dynamic environment. With over one million candidates from 100+ countries already securing their dream jobs, Final Round AI is transforming careers and breaking new ground.

Tech Stack

  • Analytics: Amplitude, Python

  • Backend: Node.JS

  • Cloud & Data Tool: GCP (BigQuery, dbt), Airbyte

  • AI: Cursor, Vibe coding, relevant AI-Agentic workflow

What we can bring to you

  • AI-native Development: Free-flow of coolest AI tools (Claude, Cursor, Devin, Zapier Agents.. you name it!). We may ask you to spend >= X tokens

  • True Ownership: We empower our engineers to think like company founders, proactively identify and own problems. You'll have significant autonomy from concept, design, tool to deployment.

  • Be Real, Be a Dreamer: We value creative and intelligent methods to achieve bigger dreams. Here you can push the boundary, collaborate with smart people, and build futuristic products together

  • High Aesthetic for Tech & Product: We champaign deep passions and high standard for technology and product. You can hold up your own taste on code quality, product design, system robustness, and the beauty of the final user experience

  • Hybrid Work: Provide flexibility for work, animal-and-plants friendly offices across China, India, and US. Sometime we organize offsite hackathon and fun parties!

  • Unlimited Pay Day-offs: Good life brings creativity. We value efficiency and impact, over unproductive overtime

What you will be hacking

  • Deliver reliable, scalable, robust, and extensible big data systems that directly support our core products and business operations

  • Design and build efficient and reliable ETL/ELT pipelines and dashboards for diverse purposes, including product insight discovery, growth analysis, feature development, and statistical analysis

  • Analyze experiment results, user behavior patterns, and other dimensions to generate insights and actions that directly influence C-level decisions and user experience worldwide

  • Conduct feature engineering for model and Agent development; Ensure the overall data and feature quality

  • Establish excellent data engineering and BI standard for the company

What we are looking for

  • Passionate about building things and especially around Big Data area

  • Strong experience in schema design, data modeling, ETL and the nuances of A/B testing

  • Proven experience in performing data analysis. You can connect disparate data sources and make sense of them

  • Possess a strong storytelling and proactive quantitative mindset, capable of educating and influencing the organization with data-driven insights

  • A good sense of AI-native development (Agent, MCP, and Prompt Engineering frameworks) and how data fuels intelligent systems

Bonus Points

  • Prior experience building and deploying real-time streaming data pipelines that power live product features

  • Experience with MLOps/LLMOps principles and tooling, especially in preparing and serving data for production AI/ML models

  • Proven experience in helping transition from traditional analytics to a more AI-driven, data-product-focused approach.

Interview Process

We don't test brain teasers, leetcode algorithms, or CS theories. We want to know your problem-solving skills and creative thinking, with real conversations. Just be yourself.

As a company innovated in hiring technology, We don’t believe in the conventional interview process – we believe it delivers minimal signals and fails to truly capture a builder’s potential. That’s why we’ve designed a process that values what you can build over what you can say.

Here’s How It Works:

  1. 15-min Intro Call - Learn more about our mission and hiring expectations

  2. Online Assignment - Use any tools you like within OA system

  3. 1 - 2 Rounds of Video Chats – Just real conversations on technical and soft skills, including some deep dives in your past projects.

  4. Paid Work Trial (1-2 Days) – If the fit feels right, you’ll dive right in and build with us. Get paid to show your skills in action.

 - A good sense of AI-native development (Agent, MCP, and Prompt Engineering frameworks) and how data fuels intelligent systems


BONUS POINTS

 - Prior experience building and deploying real-time streaming data pipelines that power live product features

 - Experience with MLOps/LLMOps principles and tooling, especially in preparing and serving data for production AI/ML models

 - Proven experience in helping transition from traditional analytics to a more AI-driven, data-product-focused approach.

We don't test brain teasers, leetcode algorithms, or CS theories. We want to know your problem-solving skills and creative thinking, with real conversations. Just be yourself.

As a company innovated in hiring technology, We don’t believe in the conventional interview process – we believe it delivers minimal signals and fails to truly capture a builder’s potential. That’s why we’ve designed a process that values what you can build over what you can say.


HERE’S HOW IT WORKS:

 1. 15-min Intro Call - Learn more about our mission and hiring expectations

 3. 1 - 2 Rounds of Video Chats – Just real conversations on technical and soft skills, including some deep dives in your past projects.

 4. Paid Work Trial (1-2 Days) – If the fit feels right, you’ll dive right in and build with us. Get paid to show your skills in action.

jobs.title: Founding AI Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Company

Based in San Francisco, California, Final Round AI is revolutionizing the job interview process with cutting-edge technology. Our platform offers real-time interview coaching, mock interview simulations from top companies, and tools to help you build a hireable resume—making it easier and faster to land your dream job. Our mission is to help you stand out, feel confident, and secure the job you’ve always wanted.


Backed by some of Silicon Valley's leading venture capital firms, Final Round AI continues to grow rapidly. Our team is expanding, and we’re looking for focused, visionary team players and leaders to join a fast-paced, dynamic environment. With over one million candidates from 100+ countries already securing their dream jobs, Final Round AI is transforming careers and breaking new ground.

Responsibilities

  • Write business logic in our cloud native backend service at scale.

  • Maintain, refactor, migration of our existed service.

  • Writing & Maintaining agent, workflows

  • Oncall & Incident Handling.

  • Code Review

  • Day to day DevOps on K8S

  • Write technical design and drive discussions on emerging new product.

  • Drive technical initiatives based on business context, conduct research and technical design to support long term business OKR.

  • Apply and adapt new knowledge / tech stack in a rapid speed. (coming out of your comfort zone is our day to day work)

Required Qualification

What we are looking for

  • Hacker spirit - Dont just talk about shit, build it.

    • Bonus - Hackathon winner / Opensource top contributor / Or just something you built thats really cool.

  • Prompt Engineering should be your second nature.

  • Being a cool kid - comfortable vibe coding and proficient with all AI tools available to you

    • Work smarter not harder

  • Large scale infra experience

    • experienced with multi tenant system with LB, sharing, sticky session, etc

  • Write Production Ready Agents + Workflow

    • Experienced at least with one agent framework

    • Bonus - Wrote agentic framework with opinioned agent design before.

    • Built system multi agent / multi modality input would be a bonus

  • Language:

    • Python - Not the spaghetti Python code though. Think twice before you apply.

    • Typescript

  • Enable to drive project without Tech Lead/CTO’s guidance with independent technical decisions.

  • Able to communicate technical design choices and decisions in both online (meeting) and offline (slack, design doc, daily reports, etc)

Process

We don't test brain teasers so there's no point of cheating the interview. Just be yourself.

We don’t believe in the conventional interview process – we believe it delivers minimal signals and fails to truly capture a builder’s potential. That’s why we’ve designed a process that values what you can build over what you can say.

Here’s How It Works:  

  1. 2 - 3 Rounds of Video Chats – No Leetcode. No brainteasers. Just real conversations.  

    1. 1-2 Technical Round - be yourself.

    2. 1 Behavior Round

  2. Your Story Matters – We care about what you’ve built before and the impact you’ve made.  

  3. Paid Work Trial (4-5 Days) – If the fit feels right, you’ll dive right in and build with us. Get paid to show your skills in action.

What We Value:  

  1. Hackers, Builders, and Doers – If you live to create, solve problems, and push boundaries, you’ll feel right at home. 

  2. Your Craft and Passion – Not just words, but what you can build. We’re looking for creators who bring ideas to life. 

  3. Challengers of the Norm – We believe in a better way to hire. If you’re bold enough to help us build it, let’s talk.


💡 No Buzzwords. No Pretenses. Just Building. If you’re ready to break the mold and build something extraordinary, join us and let’s redefine the future of hiring – together.

jobs.title: Fullstack Engineer - Infra
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Responsibilities

  • Strong Vibe Coder -

    • Able to generate 5k lines of code per day with a breeze.

    • Have the taste - https://www.thewayofcode.com/

  • 1+ years of industry full stack development experience, building consumer or business facing products

  • Language: Typescript, Python, Go (optional) and a willingness to learn

  • Experience with: Supabase, Postgres, Firebase

  • Experience in developing micro-services in NodeJS, Python and Go

  • Expertise with technologies such as React, NextJS, Electron(optional)

  • Large scale infra experience

    • Experienced with multi tenant system with LB, sticky session, cache, MQ

  • Experience in Opentelemetry, Grafana / Datadog

  • Experience in experiment / analytics platform: posthog / amplitude / optimizely etc

  • Containerized Service: Docker, ECS, k8s

  • Bullet proof production level code - edge case handling, unit tests, E2E tests

  • Oncall & Incident Handling.

    • Create monitoring dashboard + configure alert.

  • Day to day DevOps on AWS, Azure and Bare Metal server

    • EKS, GKS (k8s)

    • Hands on experience working with deploying and managing kubernetes

    • Multi regional deployment

    • VPC, Gateway

  • SSO / Auth

    • Authentik

  • Telemetry / Monitoring

    • Grafana

    • Datadog

  • Managing and deploying Offline Compute

    • Airflow

    • Ray

    • Spark

    • BigQuery

  • Infra Cost Reduction

  • Extensive knowledge in cloud native infra, including docker and k8s

  • Extensive Networking knowledge in

    • VPC, ideally have experience in VPC peering for multi cloud / bare metal

    • Internal DNS

    • Internal VPN

    • Service discovery

    • API Gateway

  • Extensive knowledge in CICD platforms

    • Github Actions

    • Spinnaker

  • Previous knowledge in infra as code -

    • Terraform

    • Pulumi

  • Love opensource community, passionate about onboarding the latest tool to our cloud infra.

  • Apply and adapt new knowledge / tech stack in a rapid speed. (coming out of your comfort zone is our day to day work)

  • CICD - canary

Required Qualification

What we are looking for

  • Large scale infra experience

    • experienced with multi tenant system with LB, sharing, sticky session, etc

  • Language: Python, Java

  • Experience with NoSQL database: Firebase, Supabase, MongoDB

  • Developing micro-services

  • Docker, Container Service

  • Bullet proof production level code - edge case handling, unit tests, E2E tests

  • Enable to drive project without Tech Lead/CTO’s guidance with independent technical decisions.

  • Able to communicate technical design choices and decisions in both online (meeting) and offline (slack, design doc, daily reports, etc)

   - VPC, Gateway

 - SSO / Auth
   
   - Authentik

 - Telemetry / Monitoring
   
   - Grafana
   
   - Datadog

 - Managing and deploying Offline Compute
   
   - Airflow
   
   - Ray
   
   - Spark
   
   - BigQuery

 - Infra Cost Reduction

 - Extensive knowledge in cloud native infra, including docker and k8s

 - Extensive Networking knowledge in
   
   - VPC, ideally have experience in VPC peering for multi cloud / bare metal
   
   - Internal DNS
   
   - Internal VPN
   
   - Service discovery
   
   - API Gateway

 - Extensive knowledge in CICD platforms
   
   - Github Actions
   
   - Spinnaker

 - Previous knowledge in infra as code -
   
   - Terraform
   
   - Pulumi

 - Love opensource community, passionate about onboarding the latest tool to our cloud infra.

 - Apply and adapt new knowledge / tech stack in a rapid speed. (coming out of your comfort zone is our day to day work)

 - CICD - canary


REQUIRED QUALIFICATION

What we are looking for

 - Large scale infra experience
   
   - experienced with multi tenant system with LB, sharing, sticky session, etc

 - Language: Python, Java

 - Experience with NoSQL database: Firebase, Supabase, MongoDB

 - Developing micro-services

 - Docker, Container Service

 - Bullet proof production level code - edge case handling, unit tests, E2E tests

 - Enable to drive project without Tech Lead/CTO’s guidance with independent technical decisions.

 - Able to communicate technical design choices and decisions in both online (meeting) and offline (slack, design doc, daily reports, etc)

jobs.title: Growth Marketing Specialist
jobs.descriptionHtml:
Job Responsibilities:

  1. Performance Marketing (Core Focus - 50%)

    • Execute and optimize paid campaigns (Google, Meta, LinkedIn, TikTok) with a focus on converting free users into paid subscribers at efficient CACs.

    • Manage ad ops — budgets, targeting, creative testing, and reporting — under guidance from the Director of Growth Marketing.

    • Proven track record of managing multi-channel paid campaigns at a scale of $250K+ per month.

  2. Lifecycle Marketing (25%)

    • Support lifecycle campaigns (email and push) by building segmented flows (free → paid, churn win-back, upsell) and running A/B tests.

    • Strong working knowledge of Customer.io (or similar lifecycle marketing platforms) for building and automating user journeys.

    • Partner with the Director of Growth Marketing on lifecycle strategy while handling day-to-day execution.

  3. Creative Ops (15%)

    • Work with design/content to generate ad creatives, UGC, and influencer assets.

    • Execute structured creative tests and surface insights for future campaigns.

  4. Additional Growth Initiatives (10%)

    • Support the affiliate/referral program (Rewardful) by onboarding affiliates, managing payouts, and tracking performance.

    • Maintain dashboards (GA4, Amplitude, Sheets) for acquisition, conversion, and retention, delivering weekly insights to the growth team.

    • Share learnings, growth hacks and creative ideas to help refine strategy and guide new experiments.

    Who You Are

    • Hands-On Executor: 3–5 years in growth/performance marketing at a SaaS or consumer tech company.

    • Multi-Cap Player: Able to wear multiple hats across paid, lifecycle, and affiliate ops, stepping in where needed to keep campaigns moving fast.

    • Startup-Ready: Thrive in a high-growth environment, able to move at rocket speed while delivering high-quality execution.

    • Performance-Driven: Experience running paid campaigns with a focus on driving free → paid conversions.

    • Lifecycle Marketer: Skilled at campaign setup/ops, with ability to work closely with leadership on lifecycle strategy.

    • Affiliate Know-How: Exposure to affiliate/referral marketing platforms (Rewardful or similar).

    • Data-Informed: Skilled at pulling insights from GA4, Amplitude, or similar tools.
